entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 06:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except west 50 gusting to 70 between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
